channel.title: Image Processing on Editor - Personal Blog Hugo Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Image Processing on Editor - Personal Blog Hugo Theme

item.title: SETI Talk: Planetary Defense: Long Period Comets
item.description: Together with my team, I gave a talk on how we can provide more warning time in case a long-period comet happens to be in a collision trajectory with Earth.

item.title: Searching for Long Period Comets with Deep Learning at NASA and SETI
item.description: In planetary defense (yes! there is such a thing, where scientists and engineers try to defend the planet from hazards), long-period comets are recognized as the potentially most devastating threat.

item.title: Get the Look on our Chatbot with Visual Search
item.description: Leveraging our image and pattern recognition technology, we developed a chatbot that enables users to search product collections using images.

item.title: Transforming the in-store shopping experience with AI
item.description: At Macty, we developed a novel in-store experience, where users can upload images of outfits and we suggest lingerie to pair it with.
